mets:mets.LABEL: University of Muenster, Institutional Repository MIAMI

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The mathematics education for the future project
mods:titleInfo.mods:subTitle: proceedings of the 13th International Conference Mathematics Education in a Connected World ; Sep 16 - 21, 2015, Grand Hotel Baia Verde, Catania, Sicily, Italy

mods:name.mods:namePart: Westfalen / Universität Münster / Universitäts- und Landesbibliothek

mods:originInfo.mods:publisher: WTM-Verlag für wissenschaftliche Texte und Medien

mods:mods.mods:abstract: This volume contains the papers presented at the International Conference on Mathematics Education in a Connected World held from September 16-21, 2015 in Catania, Italy. The Conference was organized by The Mathematics Education for the Future Project - an international educational project founded in 1986.
